function.name: application_exit
function.description: This function is used to close a specified application on a smart home device.

location.description: The location where the device which needs to be closed is located. e.g. home, office, etc.

room.description: The room where the device which needs to be closed is located.  e.g. living room, bedroom, bathroom, etc.

device.description: The name or type of the device on which the application needs to be closed. e.g. TV, fridge, mobile, etc.

appname.description: The name of the application to be closed. e.g. Netflix, prime video, etc.
